entry.value: SELECT SOURCE_DIRECTORY srcDir, PROCESSED_DIRECTORY procDir,UNPROCSSED_DIRECTORY unProcDir,ACK_DIRECTORY ackDir,WORKING_DIRECTORY workingDir FROM TPMS.T_FIELD_MAPPING WHERE FILE_TYPE=:FILE_TYPE AND AGENCY_ID =:AGENCY_ID AND FILE_FORMAT =:FILE_FORMAT

SELECT FIELD_TYPE,FIELD_NAME,START_POSITION,END_POSITION,VALIDATION_TYPE,VALIDATION_VALUE,FIELD_INDEX_POSITION,IS_POJO_VALUE,DEFAULT_VALUE,FILE_LEVEL_REJECTION FROM TPMS.T_FIELD_MAPPING_DETAIL T_FIELD_MAPPING_DETAIL INNER JOIN TPMS.T_FIELD_MAPPING T_FIELD_MAPPING ON T_FIELD_MAPPING_DETAIL.FIELD_MAPPING_PK_ID=T_FIELD_MAPPING.ID WHERE AGENCY_ID =:AGENCY_ID AND FILE_TYPE = :FILE_TYPE ORDER BY FIELD_INDEX_POSITION
SELECT COUNT(FILE_NAME) FROM TPMS.T_LANE_TX_CHECKPOINT WHERE FILE_NAME=:FILE_NAME AND XFER_XMIT_STATUS =:XFER_XMIT_STATUS
SELECT COUNT(XFER_FILE_NAME) FROM MASTER.T_XFER_CONTROL WHERE XFER_FILE_NAME=:XFER_FILE_NAME
SELECT AGENCY_ID FROM CRM.T_AGENCY WHERE FILE_PREFIX=:FILE_PREFIX
SELECT AGENCY_ID, AGENCY_NAME,DEVICE_PREFIX, IS_HOME_AGENCY FROM CRM.T_AGENCY

INSERT INTO TPMS.T_TRAN_DETAIL (LANE_TX_ID, TX_EXTERN_REF_NO, TX_TYPE, TX_SUB_TYPE, TOLL_SYSTEM_TYPE, TOLL_REVENUE_TYPE, ENTRY_TX_TIMESTAMP, ENTRY_PLAZA_ID, ENTRY_LANE_ID, ENTRY_TX_SEQ_NUMBER, ENTRY_DATA_SOURCE, ENTRY_VEHICLE_SPEED, PLAZA_AGENCY_ID, PLAZA_ID, LANE_ID, TX_DATE, TX_TIMESTAMP, LANE_MODE, LANE_STATE, TRX_LANE_SERIAL, DEVICE_NO, AVC_CLASS, TAG_IAG_CLASS, TAG_CLASS, TAG_AXLES, ACTUAL_CLASS, ACTUAL_AXLES, EXTRA_AXLES, PLATE_STATE, PLATE_NUMBER, PLATE_TYPE, PLATE_COUNTRY, READ_PERF, WRITE_PERF, PROG_STAT, COLLECTOR_NUMBER, IMAGE_CAPTURED, VEHICLE_SPEED, SPEED_VIOLATION, RECIPROCITY_TRX, IS_VIOLATION, DISCOUNTED_AMOUNT, UNREALIZED_AMOUNT, EXT_FILE_ID, RECEIVED_DATE, ACCOUNT_TYPE, ACCT_AGENCY_ID, ETC_ACCOUNT_ID, ETC_SUBACCOUNT, DST_FLAG, IS_PEAK,FARE_TYPE,UPDATE_TS,LANE_DATA_SOURCE,LANE_TYPE,LANE_HEALTH,AVC_AXLES,TOUR_SEGMENT_ID,BUF_READ,READER_ID,DEBIT_CREDIT,ETC_VALID_STATUS,DISCOUNTED_AMOUNT_2,VIDEO_FARE_AMOUNT,PLAN_TYPE,RESERVED,ATP_FILE_ID,POSTED_FARE_AMOUNT,CASH_FARE_AMOUNT,AET_FLAG,TI1_TAG_READ_STATUS,TI2_ADDITIONAL_TAGS,TI3_CLASS_MISMATCH_FLAG,TI4_TAG_STATUS,TI5_PAYMENT_FLAG,TI6_REVENUE_FLAG,DIRECTION,EVENT,HOV_FLAG,HOV_PRESENCE_TIME,HOV_LOSTPRESENCE_TIME,AVC_DISCREPANCY_FLAG,DEGRADED,UO_CODE ,AVC_PROFILE) values (:LANE_TX_ID, :TX_EXTERN_REF_NO, :TX_TYPE, :TX_SUB_TYPE, :TOLL_SYSTEM_TYPE, :TOLL_REVENUE_TYPE, :ENTRY_TX_TIMESTAMP, :ENTRY_PLAZA_ID, :ENTRY_LANE_ID, :ENTRY_TX_SEQ_NUMBER, :ENTRY_DATA_SOURCE, :ENTRY_VEHICLE_SPEED, :PLAZA_AGENCY_ID, :PLAZA_ID, :LANE_ID, :TX_DATE, :TX_TIMESTAMP, :LANE_MODE, :LANE_STATE, :TRX_LANE_SERIAL, :DEVICE_NO, :AVC_CLASS, :TAG_IAG_CLASS, :TAG_CLASS, :TAG_AXLES, :ACTUAL_CLASS, :ACTUAL_AXLES, :EXTRA_AXLES, :PLATE_STATE, :PLATE_NUMBER, :PLATE_TYPE, :PLATE_COUNTRY, :READ_PERF, :WRITE_PERF, :PROG_STAT, :COLLECTOR_NUMBER, :IMAGE_CAPTURED, :VEHICLE_SPEED, :SPEED_VIOLATION, :RECIPROCITY_TRX, :IS_VIOLATION, :DISCOUNTED_AMOUNT, :UNREALIZED_AMOUNT, :EXT_FILE_ID, :RECEIVED_DATE, :ACCOUNT_TYPE, :ACCT_AGENCY_ID,:ETC_ACCOUNT_ID,:ETC_SUBACCOUNT,:DST_FLAG,:IS_PEAK,:FARE_TYPE,:UPDATE_TS,:LANE_DATA_SOURCE,:LANE_TYPE,:LANE_HEALTH,:AVC_AXLES,:TOUR_SEGMENT_ID,:BUF_READ,:READER_ID,:DEBIT_CREDIT,:ETC_VALID_STATUS,:DISCOUNTED_AMOUNT_2,:VIDEO_FARE_AMOUNT,:PLAN_TYPE,:RESERVED,:ATP_FILE_ID,:POSTED_FARE_AMOUNT,:CASH_FARE_AMOUNT,:AET_FLAG,:TI1_TAG_READ_STATUS,:TI2_ADDITIONAL_TAGS,:TI3_CLASS_MISMATCH_FLAG,:TI4_TAG_STATUS,:TI5_PAYMENT_FLAG,:TI6_REVENUE_FLAG,:DIRECTION,:EVENT,:HOV_FLAG,:HOV_PRESENCE_TIME,:HOV_LOSTPRESENCE_TIME,:AVC_DISCREPANCY_FLAG,:DEGRADED,:UO_CODE ,:AVC_PROFILE )
SELECT SEQ_ATP_FILE_ID.NEXTVAL AS NEXTSEQ FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO TPMS.T_QATP_STATISTICS (ATP_FILE_ID, FILE_TYPE, FILE_NAME, INSERT_DATE,INSERT_TIME,RECORD_COUNT,AMOUNT ,IS_PROCESSED,PROCESS_DATE,PROCESS_TIME,PROCESS_REC_COUNT,UPDATE_TS,XFER_CONTROL_ID) values (:ATP_FILE_ID, :FILE_TYPE, :FILE_NAME, :INSERT_DATE,:INSERT_TIME,:RECORD_COUNT,:AMOUNT,:IS_PROCESSED,:PROCESS_DATE,:PROCESS_TIME,:PROCESS_REC_COUNT,:UPDATE_TS,:XFER_CONTROL_ID)
SELECT count(*) FROM TPMS.T_RECONCILIATION_CHECKPOINT where FILE_STATUS_IND = :PROCESS_STATUS and FILE_SEQ_NUM =:ATRN_FILE_NUM
select max(TX_EXTERN_REF_NO) from T_TRAN_DETAIL where EXT_FILE_ID=:EXT_FILE_ID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TPMS.T_TRAN_DETAIL WHERE TX_EXTERN_REF_NO = :TX_EXTERN_REF_NO
